程序包的使用
com.shapeville.gui

使用com.shapeville.gui的程序包
程序包
说明
com.shapeville.gui
 
com.shapeville.gui.tasks
 
  • com.shapeville.gui使用的com.shapeville.gui中的类
    类
    说明
    MainWindow
    The MainWindow class represents the main graphical user interface of the Shapeville application.
    TaskWindow
    The TaskWindow class represents the main window for different geometric tasks in Shapeville.
    UIManager
    The UIManager class is responsible for managing the user interface, task states, and user progress in the Shapeville application.
    UIManager.TaskStatus
    Enum representing the possible states of a task.
  • com.shapeville.gui.tasks使用的com.shapeville.gui中的类
    类
    说明
    TaskWindow
    The TaskWindow class represents the main window for different geometric tasks in Shapeville.
